title: BSc Games Software Engineering
description: Graduated with Second Class (Upper) Honours. Specialized in game development, software engineering principles, and computer graphics. Dissertation focused on implementing procedural algorithms for rogue-like dungeon generation, demonstrating expertise in algorithm design and game development methodologies.

title: A Levels
description: Studied Mathematics, Computer Science, and Physics. Built foundational knowledge in programming, mathematical problem-solving, and scientific principles that prepared me for university-level software engineering studies.

title: GCSEs
description: Achieved qualifications across STEM subjects (Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, ICT) and humanities (English Language & Literature, History, Religious Studies).
